full_summary:
# Notice for Editing Services Request for Standing Offer

## Solicitation Details 

* Solicitation Number: 23-222499
* Solicitation Title: Editing Services
* Reference Number: PW-22-01012681
* Amendment Number: 6
* Amendment Date: December 22, 2022
* Publication Date: November 7, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: January 16, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Procurement Category: Services (SRV)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Procurement Category: Services (SRV)
* Estimated Duration of Contract: April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2026

## Notice Description 

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada) is seeking to establish a Standing Offer (SO) for editing services. This Notice is related to the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and is open to bidders worldwide.

The Standing Offer will be used by the department to provide editing services for its communications products, both domestically and internationally. The successful bidder(s) will be expected to provide editing services for documents over 1,000 words and require 6 hours or less to complete.

To be eligible, bidders must demonstrate that they have the necessary expertise and resources to provide the required services on demand, both during and outside normal working hours.

## Requirements and Conditions 

The successful bidder(s) must meet the following requirements:

* Have at least one French and one English editor available for on-call services
* Offer services for documents over 1,000 words
* Be available to provide services on short notice
* Be available to work during non-business hours
* Be able to provide security clearance, as required for this procurement

## Evaluation Criteria 

The evaluation process will be based on the following criteria:

* Technical Merit (40%)
* Price (30%)
* Ability to Meet the Requirements (30%)

The evaluation will be conducted in accordance with the Government of Canada's tendering and contracting procedures.

## Frequently Asked Questions 

FAQs will be provided to respondents at the time of the Request for Quotations (RFQ).

## Important Information

* The notice is available in both English and French.
* Responses to this RFSO should be in the standardized Bidding Form, which can be obtained from the Government Electronic Tendering System (BUY).
* Bidders must also refer to the Government of Canada's Contracting
